snippet.title: Red Alert: A Path Beyond 2.1.1 trailer
snippet.description:
Ever wanted to drive a double barreled T-72 and smash some capitalist pigs? Pilot an invisible rocket tank? Fly Apache sorties on giant Tesla Coils? Now you can! Check out Red Alert: A Path Beyond, a free standalone indie shooter based on Command & Conquer Red Alert. 

More information:
http://www.moddb.com/games/red-alert-a-path-beyond
http://bluehellproductions.com
